entry.def: Shoestrings are long, narrow pieces of material like pieces of string that you use to fasten your shoes.
A shoestring budget is one where you have very little money to spend.

example.ex: The British-produced film was made on a shoestring budget.
example.tran: 这部英国出品的电影是小成本制作。

entry.def: If you do something or make something on a shoestring, you do it using very little money.

example.ex: The theatre will be run on a shoestring.

means.word_mean: 1. a lace used for fastening shoes

list.explanation: 资金极少的，小本经营的，小范围的，小规模的

example.en: This is just shoestring operation. There is no capital involved.
example.zh: 这只是小本经营。没什么资本投入。
